ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Using Impact font for bold, attention-grabbing CTA. Yellow primary text with orange stroke for high contrast and urgency. Deep purple background complements the 'poignant tale' with a touch of gravitas, while the yellow pops for immediate visibility on Instagram Stories. Pulsing animation creates dynamic engagement.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: Yellow (primary) signifies happiness and attention, contrasting with the deep purple (background) which can evoke mystery and depth. The vibrant orange (stroke) adds urgency and excitement, driving action. The combination creates a visually striking and accessible contrast.

ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Utilizing 'Impact' font and a bold red background with white text creates a high-contrast, urgent CTA. The pulse animation further enhances virality and catches the eye. The short words per line ensure quick readability on Instagram Stories.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: Red is used for urgency and to grab immediate attention, aligning with the CTA's goal of prompting action. White text on a dark red provides excellent contrast (well over 7:1) for WCAG AAA compliance.
